body.description: Stylish, functional seating for the home office that helps you work hard all day long. Enjoy the comfort of breathable mesh fabric and built-in lumbar support alongside the attractive black frame finish of this stylish office chair. The adjustable seat height makes this chair ideal for a variety of users. You'll have full control over your chair with the accommodating range of 2-to-1 synchro locking tilt control with adjustable tilt tension. One-touch pneumatic seat height adjustment and padded flip arms with silver accents provide further customization of a chair designed with up-to-the-minute technology. A heavy-duty base with silver accents and dual wheel carpet casters completes a sleek home or office addition accomplished with style and professionalism. Incorporated in 1987, Office Star Products has become a leader in commercial office and residential furniture. Office Star Products - Furniture for Your World.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Pulsar Series Self Adjusting SpaceFlex Back Chair with Self Adjusting Mechanism by Office Star Products is intelligently outfitted with a firm yet flexible cut out style contoured back. Brilliantly constructed with a thickly padded 2-layer mesh seat and engineered with pressurized seat height adjustment, the easily adjustable seat wicks away moisture and allows for quick and simple seat positioning.

The Screen Back Armless Task Chair by Office Star Products features a modern two-tone design and built-in lumbar support. Our task chair is made of a breathable mesh material that allows air to circulate and keep you cool.

The Screen Back Task Chair by Office Star Products features a modern two-tone design and built-in lumbar support featuring silver accented flip arms. Our task chair is made of a breathable mesh material that allows air to circulate and keep you cool.

Office Star Products, established in1987, offers a wide array of commercial rated office seating, lounge furnishings and laminate casegoods that combat the rigors of commercial environments. Our office furnishings are ideal for both commercial workspaces as well as providing comfort, style and durability to your home office. Discover our passion for customer service and easy shipping options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good chair for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I prefer the mesh chairs over the others because the material doesn't deteriorate as easily.This chair is perfect but i have only had it a week. Very easy to put together, 5 steps at most. If you are over 250lbs, I would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a mesh bottom seat with good support and this fulfilled my wishes. My current chair has a very deep textured surface with many holes and I can't clean it. Either go for open mesh, smooth fake leather or car chair cloth, never buy any textured fabric you will regret it. My daughter is 5 foot 3 inches tall and she had to put a pillow behind her. Her boyfriend is 6 foot 5 and fits him and it fits me also, 5 foot 8.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a weirdly uncomfortable chair
reviews.reviewText: Cut off circulation to legs. My son and several of his classmates have confirmed. The chairs looks wonderful, just make sure you are not going to be sitting in it for more than 5 minutes. Going Back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Our son had this chair for study for four years. Getting another one for him for college dorm since this chair sustained the test of time. Comfortable, durable, good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable, cool due the the web back and seat, easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Im a fan of a mesh bottom with a firm back, this chair started with a firm back but a few weeks into use the back is starting to sag like most chairs do. I have a modification in mind so i can straighten the back up to where it should be and then it'll be perfect again. Over all, its a good bang for the buck chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, reasonably priced, makes some noise
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty decent chair for the price. My main complaint is that it makes noise when I move around (creaking or popping). I only weigh 145lbs, so a little disappointed in this. Ended up taking off most of the silver trim pieces, which made it somewhat quieter, but still creaks a bit.UPDATE: The chair has started to make more noise as time goes on. I have had it for about 6 months and it creaks whenever you recline or move around. Not terribly noisy, but annoying. More importantly, the mesh seat has cushions all round the edge (I suppose the mesh has to anchor somewhere). The front cushion seriously aggravates my IT bands such that I need to raise my feet off the ground using a platform. I'm not sure if everyone would have this problem, but I don't have this problem on traditional seats, so thought I would share.
Excelente para oficina en casa ergonómica y transpirable

reviews.reviewTitle: Chair is great for back support.
reviews.reviewText: I got the chair for the back support and for the fact that the arms can go backward. All the previous office chairs that I've used were unable to do that. I needed that feature so that I could adjust the height without running into an issue of the arms hitting the desk. I'm very happy with the chair. It's comfortable enough for my 8-hour workday, offers lower back lumbar support, and allows me to adjust my chair to a proper height so that my neck isn't strained from looking up at my dual monitors at work. So from me, it is 5 stars.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bonita al inicio, no tan cómoda despues
reviews.reviewText: Siendo sincero, pensé que iba a estar muy cómoda, pero se me hace algo dura y de plásticos muy toscos como para lo que cuesta

It is straightforward to assemble and the package contains all the tools you need to assemble it. Only one part of its instruction confused me which is the the bellow parts...I am still not sure whether I got that part right. It is not a big deal.Well, it looks like to me that it is super easy to disassemble too. This could be both a pro and a con. (Imagine you lift it up and the base fall off..A horror memory from my childhood) There's nothing reinforces the connection of pneumatic cylinder and the base, it is just a very very light click and you can pull it off easily. Anyway, the base does not fall off when I lift it.

The chair is easy to assemble when you get all the pieces intact.However, I received mine with a wheel already broken and the plastic to hide the ''pole'' cracked.Had to go buy another wheel before i could try the chair.Other than that, chair is comfortable but heavy priced for what you get. feels like you can get basically the same chair for 150$ approx.
